df-ral
blocks.content: Define restricted universal quantification. Special case of Definition 4.15(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 22. Note: This notation is most often used to express that ` ph ` holds for all elements of a given class ` A ` . For this reading ` F/_ x A ` is required, though, for example, asserted when ` x ` and ` A ` are disjoint. Should instead ` A ` depend on ` x ` , you rather focus on those ` x ` that happen to be contained in the corresponding ` A ( x ) ` . This hardly used interpretation could still occur naturally. For some examples, look at ~ ralndv1 or ~ ralndv2 , courtesy of AV. So be careful to either keep ` A ` independent of ` x ` , or adjust your comments to include such exotic cases. (Contributed by NM, 19-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: df-rex
blocks.content: Define restricted existential quantification. Special case of Definition 4.15(4) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 22. Note: This notation is most often used to express that ` ph ` holds for at least one element of a given class ` A ` . For this reading ` F/_ x A ` is required, though, for example, asserted when ` x ` and ` A ` are disjoint. Should instead ` A ` depend on ` x ` , you rather assert at least one ` x ` fulfilling ` ph ` happens to be contained in the corresponding ` A ( x ) ` . This interpretation is rarely needed (see also ~ df-ral ). (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: df-reu
blocks.content: Define restricted existential uniqueness. Note: This notation is most often used to express that ` ph ` holds for exactly one element of a given class ` A ` . For this reading ` F/_ x A ` is required, though, for example, asserted when ` x ` and ` A ` are disjoint. Should instead ` A ` depend on ` x ` , you rather assert exactly one ` x ` fulfilling ` ph ` happens to be contained in the corresponding ` A ( x ) ` . This interpretation is rarely needed (see also ~ df-ral ). (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)

blocks.name: df-rmo
blocks.content: Define restricted "at most one". Note: This notation is most often used to express that ` ph ` holds for at most one element of a given class ` A ` . For this reading ` F/_ x A ` is required, though, for example, asserted when ` x ` and ` A ` are disjoint. Should instead ` A ` depend on ` x ` , you rather assert at most one ` x ` fulfilling ` ph ` happens to be contained in the corresponding ` A ( x ) ` . This interpretation is rarely needed (see also ~ df-ral ). (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: df-rab
blocks.content: Define a restricted class abstraction (class builder), which is the class of all ` x ` in ` A ` such that ` ph ` is true. Definition of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. Note: For the reading given above ` F/_ x A ` is required, though, for example, asserted when ` x ` and ` A ` are disjoint. Should instead ` A ` depend on ` x ` , you rather get a class of all those ` x ` fulfilling ` ph ` that happen to be contained in the corresponding ` A ( x ) ` . This need not be a subset of any of the ` A ( x ) ` at all. Such interpretation is rarely needed (see also ~ df-ral ). (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)

blocks.origin:
thm ralimdvva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ralimdva(s0, c0, w0, wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2))
  ralimdva(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1, w2)
  anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(w1, w2))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralimdvva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w1))→ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→(w1 → w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  ralimdva(s0, c0, w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w1), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2))
  ralimdva(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), w1, w2)
  anassrs(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, (w1 → w2))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: ralrimivv
blocks.content: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Restricted quantifier version with double quantification.) (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralrimivv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ralrimiv(s0, c0, w0, wral(s1, c1, w1))
  ralrimdv(s1, c1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)
  expd(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralrimivv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w1)))
  ⊣ (w0 →((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  ralrimiv(s0, c0, w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w1))
  ralrimdv(s1, c1, w0, s0 ∈ c0, w1)
  expd(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm ralrimivvva(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w1)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wral(s2, c2, w1))
  ralrimiva(s2, c2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w1)
  3anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2), w1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralrimivvva(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2, w1))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c2))→ w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2, w1)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ∀(s2 ∈ c2, w1))
  ralrimiva(s2, c2, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c1), w1)
  3anassrs(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c2, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: ralrimdvv
blocks.content: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Restricted quantifier version with double quantification.) (Contributed by NM, 1-Jun-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralrimdvv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
  -| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  ex(w0, w1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2)))
  ralrimivv(s0, s1, c0, c1, wa(w0, w1), w2)
  imp(w0, w1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralrimdvv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(w1 → ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2))))
  ⊣ (w0 →(w1 →((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→ w2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  ex(w0, w1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2)))
  ralrimivv(s0, s1, c0, c1, (w0 ∧ w1), w2)
  imp(w0, w1, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→ w2))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: ralrimdvva
blocks.content: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Restricted quantifier version with double quantification.) (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralrimdvva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {

blocks.pretty:
thm ralrimdvva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(w1 → ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2))))

  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

}

blocks.name: 2ralbidva
blocks.content: Formula-building rule for restricted universal quantifiers (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1997.) Reduce dependencies on axioms. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 9-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2ralbidva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ralbidva(s0, c0, w0, wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2))
  ralbidva(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1, w2)
  anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wb(w1, w2))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 2ralbidva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w1))↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  ralbidva(s0, c0, w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w1), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2))
  ralbidva(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), w1, w2)
  anassrs(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, (w1 ↔ w2))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: r3al
blocks.content: Triple restricted universal quantification. (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-1995.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 30-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm r3al(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), w0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), w0)))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wral(s2, c2, w0)))))
  r2al(s0, s1, c0, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0))
  2albii(s0, s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wral(s2, c2, w0)), wal(s2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), w0)))
  3bitr4ri(wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wral(s2, c2, w0)), wal(s2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), w0)), wal(s2, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c2), w0))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), c2), w0))))
  19.21v(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c2), w0))
  albii(s2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), w0), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c2), w0)))
  bitri(wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), w0), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c2), w0)), wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), w0))
  imbi1i(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c2)))
  df-3an(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2))
  impexp(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c2), w0)
  imbi2i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wral(s2, c2, w0), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), c2), w0)))
  df-ral(s2, c2, w0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: rgen3
blocks.content: Generalization rule for restricted quantification, with three quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm rgen3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0)))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), w0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  rgen2(s0, s1, c0, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0))
  ralrimiva(s2, c2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)
  3expa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rgen3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2, w0)))
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c2)→ w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  rgen2(s0, s1, c0, c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2, w0))
  ralrimiva(s2, c2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), w0)
  3expa(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c2, w0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: nfrald
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ nfral . (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfrald(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wral(s1, c0, w1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
} = {
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, wral(s1, c0, w1), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)))
  df-ral(s1, c0, w1)
  nfald2(s0, s1, w0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
  nfimd(s0, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)
  nfeld(s0, cv(s1), c0, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  adantl(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s1)))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  adantr(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, c0))
  adantr(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfrald(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → F/(s0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w1)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, w1))
} = {
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w1), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 → w1)))
  df-ral(s1, c0, w1)
  nfald2(s0, s1, w0, (s1 ∈ c0 → w1))
  nfimd(s0, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)), s1 ∈ c0, w1)
  nfeld(s0, s1, c0, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)))
  adantl(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, s1))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  adantr(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, c0))
  adantr(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, w1))
}

blocks.name: rgen2a
blocks.content: Generalization rule for restricted quantification. Note that ` x ` and ` y ` are not required to be disjoint. This proof illustrates the use of ~ dvelim . (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 1-Jan-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm rgen2a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), w0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  rgen(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, w0), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  pm2.61d2(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  syl6com(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wn(wal(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), wal(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  dvelimv(s1, s0, hs0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  alimi(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))
  alimi(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))
  syli(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  biimpd(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eleq1(cv(s1), cv(s0), c0)
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)
  df-ral(s1, c0, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s0), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rgen2a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w0))
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→ w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  rgen(s0, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w0))
  sylibr(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w0), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 → w0)))
  pm2.61d2(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 → w0)), ∀(s1, s1 = s0))
  syl6com(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ ∀(s1, s1 = s0), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 → w0)), ∀(s1, s0 ∈ c0))
  dvelimv(s1, s0, hs0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eleq1(hs0, s0, c0)
  alimi(s1, s0 ∈ c0, (s1 ∈ c0 → w0))
  alimi(s1, s1 = s0, (s1 ∈ c0 → w0))
  syli(s1 = s0, s1 ∈ c0, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  biimpd(s1 = s0, s1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c0)
  eleq1(s1, s0, c0)
  ex(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, w0)
  df-ral(s1, c0, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 ∈ c0)
}

blocks.name: 2ralbida
blocks.content: Formula-building rule for restricted universal quantifier (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2ralbida(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  ralbida(s0, c0, w0, wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2))
  ralbida(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1, w2)
  nfan(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wb(w1, w2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 2ralbida(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w1))↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2))))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  ralbida(s0, c0, w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w1), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2))
  ralbida(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), w1, w2)
  nfan(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s1, s0 ∈ c0)
  anassrs(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, (w1 ↔ w2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: reximdvva
blocks.content: Deduction doubly quantifying both antecedent and consequent, based on Theorem 19.22 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Contributed by AV, 5-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm reximdvva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w2))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  reximdva(s0, c0, w0, wrex(s1, c1, w1), wrex(s1, c1, w2))
  reximdva(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1, w2)
  anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(w1, w2))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm reximdvva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1))→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w2))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→(w1 → w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  reximdva(s0, c0, w0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w2))
  reximdva(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), w1, w2)
  anassrs(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, (w1 → w2))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: reximddv2
blocks.content: Double deduction from Theorem 19.22 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm reximddv2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2), w1)
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  reximddv(s0, c0, w0, wrex(s1, c1, w1), wrex(s1, c1, w2))
  impr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s1, c1, w2), wrex(s1, c1, w1))
  reximdva(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w2, w1)
  ex(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm reximddv2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1)))
  ⊣ ((((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ w2)→ w1)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  reximddv(s0, c0, w0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w2))
  impr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w2), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1))
  reximdva(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), w2, w1)
  ex(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c1), w2, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: r19.23v
blocks.content: Restricted quantifier version of ~ 19.23v . Version of ~ r19.23 with a disjoint variable condition. (Contributed by NM, 31-Aug-1999.) Reduce dependencies on axioms. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 14-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm r19.23v(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1))
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
} = {
  3bitri(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1), wral(s0, c0, wi(wn(w1), wn(w0))), wi(wn(w1), wral(s0, c0, wn(w0))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w1), wn(w0)))
  con34b(w0, w1)
  r19.21v(s0, c0, wn(w1), wn(w0))
  bitr2i(wi(wn(w1), wral(s0, c0, wn(w0))), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1), wi(wn(wral(s0, c0, wn(w0))), w1))
  imbi1i(wrex(s0, c0, w0), w1, wn(wral(s0, c0, wn(w0))))
  dfrex2(s0, c0, w0)
  con1b(wral(s0, c0, wn(w0)), w1)
  diff.wn.s(s0, w1)
}

blocks.origin:
thm rexlimivv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), w1)
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  rexlimiv(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0), w1)
  rexlimdva(s1, c1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rexlimivv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0))→ w1)
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(w0 → w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  rexlimiv(s0, c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w0), w1)
  rexlimdva(s1, c1, s0 ∈ c0, w0, w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm rexlimdvv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)), w2))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w1, w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
} = {
  rexlimdva(s0, c0, w0, wrex(s1, c1, w1), w2)
  rexlimdv(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1, w2)
  expdimp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(w1, w2))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rexlimdvv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1))→ w2))
  ⊣ (w0 →((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(w1 → w2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
} = {
  rexlimdva(s0, c0, w0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1), w2)
  rexlimdv(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), w1, w2)
  expdimp(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, (w1 → w2))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm 2rexbidva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w2))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  rexbidva(s0, c0, w0, wrex(s1, c1, w1), wrex(s1, c1, w2))
  rexbidva(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1, w2)
  anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wb(w1, w2))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 2rexbidva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w2))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  rexbidva(s0, c0, w0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w1), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, w2))
  rexbidva(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), w1, w2)
  anassrs(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, (w1 ↔ w2))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: reximd2a
blocks.content: Deduction quantifying both antecedent and consequent, based on Theorem 19.22 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm reximd2a(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), w2), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  -| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), w2), w1)
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c1, w2))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c1, w2))
  3imtr4g(w0, wrex(s0, c1, w2), wrex(s0, c0, w1), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
  eximd(s0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))
  expl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), w2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))
  jca(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), w2), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)
  df-rex(s0, c1, w2)
  df-rex(s0, c0, w1)

  bitri(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))))
  2albii(s0, s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))
  ancomst(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0)
  alcom(s0, s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))
  r2alf(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  r2alf(s1, s0, c1, c0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: rexcomf
blocks.content: Commutation of restricted existential quantifiers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexcomf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))))
  bitri(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))))
  2exbii(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))
  anbi1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  excom(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))
  r2exf(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  r2exf(s1, s0, c1, c0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: ralcom
blocks.content: Commutation of restricted universal quantifiers. See ~ ralcom2 for a version without disjoint variable condition on ` x , y ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s1, c1, wral(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s1, c1, wral(s0, c0, w0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))))
  bitri(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))))
  2albii(s0, s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))
  ancomst(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0)
  alcom(s0, s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))
  r2al(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  r2al(s1, s0, c1, c0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: rexcom
blocks.content: Commutation of restricted existential quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 19-Nov-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))))
  bitri(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))))
  2exbii(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))
  anbi1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  excom(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0))
  r2ex(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  r2ex(s1, s0, c1, c0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: ralcom13
blocks.content: Swap first and third restricted universal quantifiers. (Contributed by AV, 3-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralcom13(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0))), wral(s2, c2, wral(s1, c1, wral(s0, c0, w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0))), wral(s2, c2, wral(s1, c1, wral(s0, c0, w0))), wral(s1, c1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s2, c2, w0))), wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, wral(s0, c0, w0))))
  ralcom(s0, s1, c0, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0))
  ralbii(s1, c1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s2, c2, w0)), wral(s2, c2, wral(s0, c0, w0)))
  ralcom(s0, s2, c0, c2, w0)
  ralcom(s1, s2, c1, c2, wral(s0, c0, w0))
}

blocks.name: rexcom13
blocks.content: Swap first and third restricted existential quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexcom13(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0))), wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0))), wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s2, c2, w0))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s0, c0, w0))))
  rexcom(s0, s1, c0, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w0))
  rexbii(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s2, c2, w0)), wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s0, c0, w0)))
  rexcom(s0, s2, c0, c2, w0)
  rexcom(s1, s2, c1, c2, wrex(s0, c0, w0))
}

blocks.name: ralrot3
blocks.content: Rotate three restricted universal quantifiers. (Contributed by AV, 3-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralrot3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0))), wral(s2, c2, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0))), wral(s2, c2, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)))), diffss(s0, s1))
  bitri(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0))), wral(s2, c2, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s2, c2, wral(s1, c1, w0))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c2, w0)), wral(s2, c2, wral(s1, c1, w0)))
  ralcom(s1, s2, c1, c2, w0)
  ralcom(s0, s2, c0, c2, wral(s1, c1, w0))
}

blocks.name: rexrot4
blocks.content: Rotate four restricted existential quantifiers twice. (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexrot4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s3, c3, w0)))), wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s3, c3, w0)))), wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s3, c3, w0)))), wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s1, c1, w0)))))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s3, c3, w0))), wrex(s3, c3, wrex(s2, c2, wrex(s1, c1, w0))))
  rexcom13(s1, s2, s3, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  rexcom13(s0, s3, s2, c0, c3, c2, wrex(s1, c1, w0))
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
}

blocks.name: ralcom2
blocks.content: Commutation of restricted universal quantifiers. Note that ` x ` and ` y ` need not be disjoint (this makes the proof longer). If ` x ` and ` y ` are disjoint, then one may use ~ ralcom . (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-1994.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralcom2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0)), wral(s1, c0, wral(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0)), wral(s1, c0, wral(s0, c0, w0))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  biimpd(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0)), wral(s1, c0, wral(s0, c0, w0)))
  3bitr4g(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0)), wral(s1, c0, wral(s0, c0, w0)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, w0))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wral(s0, c0, w0))))
  dral1(s0, s1, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, w0)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wral(s0, c0, w0)))
  imbi12d(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, w0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wral(s0, c0, w0))
  3bitr4g(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wral(s1, c0, w0), wral(s0, c0, w0), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  bicomd(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  dral1(s0, s1, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))
  imbi1d(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  sps(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  eleq1w(s0, s1, c0)
  df-ral(s1, c0, w0)
  df-ral(s0, c0, w0)
  df-ral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0))
  df-ral(s1, c0, wral(s0, c0, w0))
  ex(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0)), wral(s1, c0, wral(s0, c0, w0)))
  ralrimi(s1, c0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0))), wral(s0, c0, w0))
  nfan(s1, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0)))
  nfnae(s1, s0, s1)
  nfra2(s1, s0, c0, c0, w0)
  ex(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wral(s0, c0, w0))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, wa(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0))), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), w0)
  nfan1(s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0))), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  nfan(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0)))
  nfnae(s0, s0, s1)
  nfra1(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0))
  nfeld(s0, cv(s1), c0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0))))
  adantr(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0)), wnfc(s0, cv(s1)))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  nfcvd(s0, c0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0))))
  adantll(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  expdimp(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  ancomsd(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  rsp2(s0, s1, c0, c0, w0)
}

blocks.name: ralcom3
blocks.content: A commutation law for restricted universal quantifiers that swaps the domains of the restriction. (Contributed by NM, 22-Feb-2004.)

blocks.name: reean
blocks.content: Rearrange restricted existential quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2010.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm reean(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(w0, w1))), wa(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(w0, w1))), wa(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(w0, w1)))), wa(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1))))
  bitri(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(w0, w1)))), wa(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)))))
  2exbii(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(w0, w1)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)))
  an4(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), w0, w1)
  eean(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1))
  nfan(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  r2ex(s0, s1, c0, c1, wa(w0, w1))
  anbi12i(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)))
  df-rex(s0, c0, w0)
  df-rex(s1, c1, w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: reeanv
blocks.content: Rearrange restricted existential quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-1999.)

blocks.name: 3reeanv
blocks.content: Rearrange three restricted existential quantifiers. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm 3reeanv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w3a(w0, w1, w2)))), w3a(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1), wrex(s2, c2, w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w3a(w0, w1, w2)))), w3a(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1), wrex(s2, c2, w2)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wrex(s1, c1, wa(w0, w1)), wrex(s2, c2, w2))), wa(wa(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1)), wrex(s2, c2, w2)))
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wa(wrex(s1, c1, wa(w0, w1)), wrex(s2, c2, w2))), wa(wa(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1)), wrex(s2, c2, w2)), wa(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(w0, w1))), wrex(s2, c2, w2)))
  r19.41v(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(w0, w1)), wrex(s2, c2, w2))
  anbi1i(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(w0, w1))), wrex(s2, c2, w2), wa(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
  reeanv(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  rexbii(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w3a(w0, w1, w2))), wa(wrex(s1, c1, wa(w0, w1)), wrex(s2, c2, w2)))
  bitri(wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, w3a(w0, w1, w2))), wa(wrex(s1, c1, wa(w0, w1)), wrex(s2, c2, w2)), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wa(wa(w0, w1), w2))))
  2rexbii(s1, s2, c1, c2, w3a(w0, w1, w2), wa(wa(w0, w1), w2))
  df-3an(w0, w1, w2)
  reeanv(s1, s2, c1, c2, wa(w0, w1), w2)
  df-3an(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1), wrex(s2, c2, w2))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s2, c2, w2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: 2ralor
blocks.content: Distribute restricted universal quantification over "or". (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2ralor(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wo(w0, w1))), wo(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  con4bii(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wo(w0, w1))), wo(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1)))
  3bitr4i(wn(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wo(w0, w1)))), wn(wo(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))), wa(wrex(s0, c0, wn(w0)), wrex(s1, c1, wn(w1))), wa(wn(wral(s0, c0, w0)), wn(wral(s1, c1, w1))))
  anbi12i(wrex(s0, c0, wn(w0)), wrex(s1, c1, wn(w1)), wn(wral(s0, c0, w0)), wn(wral(s1, c1, w1)))
  rexnal(s0, c0, w0)
  rexnal(s1, c1, w1)
  3bitr3ri(wn(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wo(w0, w1)))), wa(wrex(s0, c0, wn(w0)), wrex(s1, c1, wn(w1))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wral(s1, c1, wo(w0, w1)))))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wn(w0), wn(w1))), wn(wral(s1, c1, wo(w0, w1))))
  bitr3i(wrex(s1, c1, wa(wn(w0), wn(w1))), wn(wral(s1, c1, wo(w0, w1))), wrex(s1, c1, wn(wo(w0, w1))))
  rexbii(s1, c1, wn(wo(w0, w1)), wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)))
  ioran(w0, w1)
  rexnal(s1, c1, wo(w0, w1))
  reeanv(s0, s1, c0, c1, wn(w0), wn(w1))
  rexnal(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wo(w0, w1)))
  ioran(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))
  diff.wn.s(s0, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w0)
}

blocks.name: nfreud
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ nfreu . (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfreud(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wreu(s1, c0, w1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
} = {
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, wreu(s1, c0, w1), weu(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)))
  df-reu(s1, c0, w1)
  nfeud2(s0, s1, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
  nfand(s0, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)
  nfeld(s0, cv(s1), c0, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  adantl(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s1)))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  adantr(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, c0))
  adantr(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfreud(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → F/(s0, ∃!(s1 ∈ c0, w1)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, w1))
} = {
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, ∃!(s1 ∈ c0, w1), ∃!(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1)))
  df-reu(s1, c0, w1)
  nfeud2(s0, s1, w0, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1))
  nfand(s0, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)), s1 ∈ c0, w1)
  nfeld(s0, s1, c0, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)))
  adantl(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, s1))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  adantr(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, c0))
  adantr(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, w1))
}

blocks.name: nfrmod
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ nfrmo . (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfrmod(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wrmo(s1, c0, w1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
} = {
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, wrmo(s1, c0, w1), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)))
  df-rmo(s1, c0, w1)
  nfmod2(s0, s1, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
  nfand(s0, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)
  nfeld(s0, cv(s1), c0, wa(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  adantl(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s1)))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  adantr(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, c0))
  adantr(w0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfrmod(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → F/(s0, ∃*(s1 ∈ c0, w1)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, w1))
} = {
  nfxfrd(s0, w0, ∃*(s1 ∈ c0, w1), ∃*(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1)))
  df-rmo(s1, c0, w1)
  nfmod2(s0, s1, w0, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1))
  nfand(s0, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)), s1 ∈ c0, w1)
  nfeld(s0, s1, c0, (w0 ∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)))
  adantl(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, s1))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  adantr(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, c0))
  adantr(w0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, w1))
}

blocks.name: nfrmo
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for restricted uniqueness. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfrmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wnf(s0, wrmo(s1, c0, w0))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
} = {
  nfxfr(s0, wrmo(s1, c0, w0), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  df-rmo(s1, c0, w0)
  mptru(wnf(s0, wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))))
  nfmod2(s0, s1, wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))
  nftru(s1)
  adantl(wtru, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  nfand(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)
  nfeld(s0, cv(s1), c0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  a1i(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, c0))
  a1i(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfrmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, ∃*(s1 ∈ c0, w0))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
} = {
  nfxfr(s0, ∃*(s1 ∈ c0, w0), ∃*(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)))
  df-rmo(s1, c0, w0)
  mptru(F/(s0, ∃*(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))))
  nfmod2(s0, s1, wtru, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
  nftru(s1)
  adantl(wtru, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0,(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)))
  nfand(s0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), s1 ∈ c0, w0)
  nfeld(s0, s1, c0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  a1i(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, c0))
  a1i(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, w0))
}

blocks.name: nfrab
blocks.content: A variable not free in a wff remains so in a restricted class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wnfc(s0, crab(s1, c0, w0))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, crab(s1, c0, w0), cab(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  df-rab(s1, c0, w0)
  mptru(wnfc(s0, cab(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))))
  nfabd2(s0, s1, wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))
  nftru(s1)
  adantl(wtru, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  nfand(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)
  dvelimnf(s0, s1, hs0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1w(hs0, s1, c0)
  a1i(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnf(s0, w0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, { s1 ∈ c0 | w0 })
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, { s1 ∈ c0 | w0 }, { s1 |(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)})
  df-rab(s1, c0, w0)
  mptru(F/(s0, { s1 |(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)}))
  nfabd2(s0, s1, wtru, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
  nftru(s1)
  adantl(wtru, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0,(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)))
  nfand(s0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), s1 ∈ c0, w0)
  dvelimnf(s0, s1, hs0, s1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1w(hs0, s1, c0)
  a1i(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), F/(s0, w0))
  diff.hs0.w(s1 ∈ c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cbvralf
blocks.content: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvralf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s1, c0, w1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s1, c0, w1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)))
  bitri(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))
  cbvalv1(s0, hs0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  nfv(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  nfim(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  cbvalv1(hs0, s1, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
  nfim(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c0)
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)
  eleq1w(hs0, s1, c0)
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), w1, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  sbequ(hs0, s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  df-ral(s0, c0, w0)
  df-ral(s1, c0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvralf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, w0)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
} = {
  3bitr4i(∀(s0 ∈ c0, w0), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w1), ∀(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 → w0)), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 → w1)))
  bitri(∀(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 → w0)), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 → w1)), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 →[hs0 / s0]w0)))
  cbvalv1(s0, hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 → w0), (hs0 ∈ c0 →[hs0 / s0]w0))
  nfv(hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 → w0))
  nfim(s0, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 ∈ c0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  cbvalv1(hs0, s1, (hs0 ∈ c0 →[hs0 / s0]w0), (s1 ∈ c0 → w1))
  nfim(s1, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c0)
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, (s1 ∈ c0 → w1))
  imbi12d(hs0 = s1, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]w0, s1 ∈ c0, w1)
  eleq1w(hs0, s1, c0)
  syl6bb(hs0 = s1, [hs0 / s0]w0, w1, [s1 / s0]w0)
  sbequ(hs0, s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  df-ral(s0, c0, w0)
  df-ral(s1, c0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ∈ c0 → w0))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ∈ c0 → w1))
}

blocks.name: cbvrexf
blocks.content: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by FL, 27-Apr-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvrexf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c0, w1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c0, w1), wn(wral(s0, c0, wn(w0))), wn(wral(s1, c0, wn(w1))))
  notbii(wral(s0, c0, wn(w0)), wral(s1, c0, wn(w1)))
  cbvralf(s0, s1, c0, wn(w0), wn(w1))
  nfn(s1, w0)
  nfn(s0, w1)
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, w1)
  dfrex2(s0, c0, w0)
  dfrex2(s1, c0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvrexf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0 ∈ c0, w0)↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c0, w1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
} = {
  3bitr4i(∃(s0 ∈ c0, w0), ∃(s1 ∈ c0, w1), ¬ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ w0), ¬ ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ¬ w1))
  notbii(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ¬ w0), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ¬ w1))
  cbvralf(s0, s1, c0, ¬ w0, ¬ w1)
  nfn(s1, w0)
  nfn(s0, w1)
  notbid(s0 = s1, w0, w1)
  dfrex2(s0, c0, w0)
  dfrex2(s1, c0, w1)
}

blocks.name: cbvreu
blocks.content: Change the bound variable of a restricted unique existential quantifier using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvreu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wreu(s0, c0, w0), wreu(s1, c0, w1))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wreu(s0, c0, w0), wreu(s1, c0, w1), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), weu(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)))
  3bitri(weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), weu(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)), weu(hs0, wsb(hs0, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), weu(hs0, wa(wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))
  sb8eu(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  eubii(hs0, wsb(hs0, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wa(wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  sban(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  bitri(weu(hs0, wa(wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))), weu(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)), weu(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))
  eubii(hs0, wa(wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  anbi1i(wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  clelsb3(hs0, s0, c0)
  cbveu(hs0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
  nfan(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)
  eleq1w(hs0, s1, c0)
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), w1, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  sbequ(hs0, s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  df-reu(s0, c0, w0)
  df-reu(s1, c0, w1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvreu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∃!(s0 ∈ c0, w0)↔ ∃!(s1 ∈ c0, w1))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(∃!(s0 ∈ c0, w0), ∃!(s1 ∈ c0, w1), ∃!(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)), ∃!(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1)))
  3bitri(∃!(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)), ∃!(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1)), ∃!(hs0,[hs0 / s0](s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)), ∃!(hs0,([hs0 / s0]s0 ∈ c0 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0)))
  sb8eu(s0, hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
  nfv(hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
  eubii(hs0, [hs0 / s0](s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0), ([hs0 / s0]s0 ∈ c0 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0))
  sban(hs0, s0, s0 ∈ c0, w0)
  bitri(∃!(hs0,([hs0 / s0]s0 ∈ c0 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0)), ∃!(s1,(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1)), ∃!(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0)))
  eubii(hs0, ([hs0 / s0]s0 ∈ c0 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0))
  anbi1i([hs0 / s0]s0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  clelsb3(hs0, s0, c0)
  cbveu(hs0, s1, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0), (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1))
  nfan(s1, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfv(s1, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = s1, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]w0, s1 ∈ c0, w1)
  eleq1w(hs0, s1, c0)
  syl6bb(hs0 = s1, [hs0 / s0]w0, w1, [s1 / s0]w0)
  sbequ(hs0, s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  df-reu(s0, c0, w0)
  df-reu(s1, c0, w1)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1))
}

thm cbvrmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrmo(s0, c0, w0), wrmo(s1, c0, w1))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)

} = {
  3bitr4i(wrmo(s0, c0, w0), wrmo(s1, c0, w1), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wreu(s0, c0, w0)), wi(wrex(s1, c0, w1), wreu(s1, c0, w1)))
  imbi12i(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wreu(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c0, w1), wreu(s1, c0, w1))
  cbvrex(s0, s1, c0, w0, w1)
  cbvreu(s0, s1, c0, w0, w1)

  rmo5(s1, c0, w1)
}

blocks.name: cbvraldva2
blocks.content: Rule used to change the bound variable in a restricted universal quantifier with implicit substitution which also changes the quantifier domain. Deduction form. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvraldva2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)))
  pm5.74ri(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)))
  3bitr3i(wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))), wi(w0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2))), wal(s0, wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))), wal(s1, wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2))))
  cbvalvw(s0, s1, wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)))
  pm5.74d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2))
  expcom(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, wb(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)))
  imbi12d(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1, wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)
  eleq12d(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  19.21v(s0, w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))
  19.21v(s1, w0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2))
  df-ral(s0, c0, w1)
  df-ral(s1, c1, w2)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2))
  diff.wi.s(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))
  diff.wi.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm cbvrexdva2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s1, c1, w2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s1, c1, w2), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)))
  mpbir(wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)))), wb(wa(w0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))), wa(w0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)))))
  3bitr3i(wa(w0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))), wa(w0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2))), wex(s0, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))), wex(s1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2))))
  cbvexvw(s0, s1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)))
  pm5.32da(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2))

blocks.name: cbvraldva
blocks.content: Rule used to change the bound variable in a restricted universal quantifier with implicit substitution. Deduction form. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvraldva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s1, c0, w2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  cbvraldva2(s0, s1, c0, c0, w0, w1, w2)
  eqidd(c0, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvraldva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∀(s0 ∈ c0, w1)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w2)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = s1)→(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  cbvraldva2(s0, s1, c0, c0, w0, w1, w2)
  eqidd(c0, (w0 ∧ s0 = s1))
}

  cbvralv(s0, s3, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2, w0)), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2, w2)))
  2ralbidv(s1, s2, c1, c2, s0 = s3, w0, w2)
  ralbii(s3, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2, w2)), ∀(s4 ∈ c1, ∀(s5 ∈ c2, w1)))
  cbvral2v(s1, s2, s4, s5, c1, c2, w2, w1, w3)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2, w2))
  diff.wral.s(s0, s2, c2, w2)
  diff.wral.s(s3, s1, c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c2, w0))
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.wral.s(s3, s2, c2, w0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: sbralie
blocks.content: Implicit to explicit substitution that swaps variables in a quantified expression. (Contributed by NM, 5-Sep-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbralie(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wral(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wral(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), w1), wral(hs0, cv(s0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wral(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wral(hs0, cv(s0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wsb(s0, s1, wral(hs0, cv(s1), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))
  sbbii(s0, s1, wral(s0, cv(s1), w0), wral(hs0, cv(s1), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  cbvralsv(s0, hs0, cv(s1), w0)
  sbie(s0, s1, wral(hs0, cv(s1), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wral(hs0, cv(s0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  nfv(s1, wral(hs0, cv(s0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  raleq(hs0, cv(s1), cv(s0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  bitri(wral(hs0, cv(s0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), w1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wsb(s1, hs0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))
  cbvralsv(hs0, s1, cv(s0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  ralbii(s1, cv(s0), wsb(s1, hs0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), w1)
  bitri(wsb(s1, hs0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), w1, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  sbco2(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  nfv(s0, w1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wral.s(s1, hs0, cv(s0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.wsb.s(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbralie(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ([s0 / s1]∀(s0 ∈ s1, w0)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ s0, w1))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitri([s0 / s1]∀(s0 ∈ s1, w0), ∀(s1 ∈ s0, w1), ∀(hs0 ∈ s0,[hs0 / s0]w0))
  bitri([s0 / s1]∀(s0 ∈ s1, w0), ∀(hs0 ∈ s0,[hs0 / s0]w0), [s0 / s1]∀(hs0 ∈ s1,[hs0 / s0]w0))
  sbbii(s0, s1, ∀(s0 ∈ s1, w0), ∀(hs0 ∈ s1,[hs0 / s0]w0))
  cbvralsv(s0, hs0, s1, w0)
  sbie(s0, s1, ∀(hs0 ∈ s1,[hs0 / s0]w0), ∀(hs0 ∈ s0,[hs0 / s0]w0))
  nfv(s1, ∀(hs0 ∈ s0,[hs0 / s0]w0))
  raleq(hs0, s1, s0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  bitri(∀(hs0 ∈ s0,[hs0 / s0]w0), ∀(s1 ∈ s0, w1), ∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / hs0][hs0 / s0]w0))
  cbvralsv(hs0, s1, s0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  ralbii(s1, s0, [s1 / hs0][hs0 / s0]w0, w1)
  bitri([s1 / hs0][hs0 / s0]w0, w1, [s1 / s0]w0)
  sbco2(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  nfv(s0, w1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wral.s(s1, hs0, s0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.wsb.s(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: cbvrab
blocks.content: Rule to change the bound variable in a restricted class abstraction, using implicit substitution. This version has bound-variable hypotheses in place of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 11-Jul-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s1, c0, w1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s1, c0, w1), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cab(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)))
  eqtri(cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cab(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)), cab(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))
  cbvab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  cbvab(hs0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
  nfan(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c0)
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)
  eleq1w(hs0, s1, c0)
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), w1, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  sbequ(hs0, s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  df-rab(s0, c0, w0)
  df-rab(s1, c0, w1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ { s0 ∈ c0 | w0 } = { s1 ∈ c0 | w1 }
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
} = {
  3eqtr4i({ s0 ∈ c0 | w0 }, { s1 ∈ c0 | w1 }, { s0 |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)}, { s1 |(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1)})
  eqtri({ s0 |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)}, { s1 |(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1)}, { hs0 |(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0)})
  cbvab(s0, hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0))
  nfv(hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
  nfan(s0, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  anbi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 ∈ c0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  cbvab(hs0, s1, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0), (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1))
  nfan(s1, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c0)
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = s1, hs0 ∈ c0, [hs0 / s0]w0, s1 ∈ c0, w1)
  eleq1w(hs0, s1, c0)
  syl6bb(hs0 = s1, [hs0 / s0]w0, w1, [s1 / s0]w0)
  sbequ(hs0, s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  df-rab(s0, c0, w0)
  df-rab(s1, c0, w1)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1))
}

blocks.name: cbvrabv
blocks.content: Rule to change the bound variable in a restricted class abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1999.) Require ` x ` , ` y ` be disjoint to avoid ~ ax-11 and ~ ax-13 . (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 4-Dec-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvrabv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s1, c0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s1, c0, w1), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cab(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)))
  cbvabv(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)
  eleq1w(s0, s1, c0)
  df-rab(s0, c0, w0)
  df-rab(s1, c0, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvrabv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ { s0 ∈ c0 | w0 } = { s1 ∈ c0 | w1 }
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i({ s0 ∈ c0 | w0 }, { s1 ∈ c0 | w1 }, { s0 |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)}, { s1 |(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1)})
  cbvabv(s0, s1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0), (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ w1))
  anbi12d(s0 = s1, s0 ∈ c0, w0, s1 ∈ c0, w1)
  eleq1w(s0, s1, c0)
  df-rab(s0, c0, w0)
  df-rab(s1, c0, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, s1 ∈ c0, w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, s0 ∈ c0, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: cbvrabvOLD

thm cbvrabvOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s1, c0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  cbvrab(s0, s1, c0, w0, w1)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfv(s0, w1)
}

blocks.name: rabrabi
blocks.content: Abstract builder restricted to another restricted abstract builder with implicit substitution. (Contributed by AV, 2-Aug-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm rabrabi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wceq(crab(s0, crab(s1, c0, w0), w1), crab(s0, c0, wa(w2, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w2, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
} = {
  eqtri(crab(s0, crab(s1, c0, w0), w1), crab(s0, c0, wa(w2, w1)), crab(s0, crab(s0, c0, w2), w1))
  rabeqif(s0, crab(s1, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w2), w1)
  nfcv(s0, crab(s1, c0, w0))
  nfrab1(s0, c0, w2)
  cbvrabv(s1, s0, c0, w0, w2)
  equcoms(s1, s0, wb(w0, w2))
  bicomd(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, w2)
  rabrab(s0, c0, w2, w1)
  diff.crab.s(s0, s1, c0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rabrabi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ { s0 ∈ { s1 ∈ c0 | w0 } | w1 } = { s0 ∈ c0 |(w2 ∧ w1)}
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w2 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
} = {
  eqtri({ s0 ∈ { s1 ∈ c0 | w0 } | w1 }, { s0 ∈ c0 |(w2 ∧ w1)}, { s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w2 } | w1 })
  rabeqif(s0, { s1 ∈ c0 | w0 }, { s0 ∈ c0 | w2 }, w1)
  nfcv(s0, { s1 ∈ c0 | w0 })
  nfrab1(s0, c0, w2)
  cbvrabv(s1, s0, c0, w0, w2)
  equcoms(s1, s0, (w0 ↔ w2))
  bicomd(s0 = s1, w0, w2)
  rabrab(s0, c0, w2, w1)
  diff.crab.s(s0, s1, c0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
